snippet: In the worst-hit corner of the West’s brutal fire season, a racing blaze made quick work of the Flying W Ranch, and of the musical tradition of four singing cowboys.
abstract: Flying W Wranglers, a musical group that has sung Western songs to tourists visiting the Flying W Ranch in Colorado Springs, has found itself homeless after a wildfire destroyed their venue of 54 years; the four members of the band's latest iteration are confronting the same issues as thousands of people whose homes have burned in blazes across the West.
lead_paragraph: In the worst-hit corner of the West’s brutal fire season, a racing blaze made quick work of the Flying W Ranch, and of the musical tradition of four singing cowboys.

headline.seo: Wranglers of Flying W Ranch Lose Livelihood in Wildfire
headline.main: After Wildfire, a Cowboy Band Fights to Keep a Heritage Alive
headline.print_headline: After Wildfire, a Cowboy Band Fights to Keep a Heritage Alive

keywords.value: Wranglers of the Flying W Ranch
